It is one of the cheapest and most common amulets in the game because of the low Crafting level to craft it, how common sapphires are, and the low Magic level to enchant the amulet.

Item ID1727

An amulet of magic is an amulet that gives a Magic attack bonus when worn. It is created by casting Lvl-1 Enchant on a sapphire amulet. It is one of the cheapest and most common amulets in the game because of the low Crafting level to craft it, how common sapphires are, and the low Magic level to enchant the amulet.

A normal amulet of magic, as well as its trimmed variant are both possible reward for the completion of easy Treasure Trails.

 Attack bonuses
+0+0+0+10+0
 Defence bonuses
+0+0+0+0+0
